product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency Mode, Personalized Spatial Audio, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone – Pink
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: Lightning. Model Name: AirPods Max. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth, NFC. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: memory foam. Specific Uses For Product: Music. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling, Recording, Exercising, Gaming, Disc Jockey Use. Compatible Devices: Cellphones, Tablets, Telephones, Music Production Equipment, Laptops, Desktops. Theme: TV Series. Control Type: Call Control, Media Control, Volume Control, Voice Control, Noise Control. Cable Feature: Detachable. Item Weight: 13.6 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Unit Count: 1.0 Count. Style: Lightning. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 20 Hour. Product Dimensions: 9.43 x 9.57 x 3.15 inches. Language: English, English, English, English, English. Batteries: 2 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included).

banner_details:
This banner is a modern and sleek promotional design for a premium audio product. The layout is split into two zones: a left-aligned content area and a product visual on the right, separated by a vertical dashed line. The primary background features a soft pink-to-blush gradient with abstract circles and curved line patterns for a dynamic feel. Prominent bold text elements (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) convey the product name in vibrant red. Supporting details (`subheading`, `description`) explain the product features in clean sans-serif fonts. A bright red price tag (`price`) and a matching call-to-action (`cta_button_background` with `cta`) ensure user focus. The product image (`product_image`) stands out with realistic rendering and reflective highlights.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink Gradient: `#FFF0F0` to `#FFD6D6`
- Accent Red: `#FF5252`, `#FF5757`, `#FF9494`
- Dark Text: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern color palette, blending shades of coral red, rose gold, and soft pink tones. The headband is dominated by a vibrant coral red (#E34234), creating a bold and energetic contrast. The ear cushions merge light coral and pink mesh patterns (#F88379), offering a textured and soft appeal. The metallic ear cups exhibit a polished rose gold finish (#DA8A67), adding a touch of luxury. Chrome accents (#C0C0C0) connect the parts seamlessly. The overall color blend gives a balanced, stylish look—ideal for an ad banner with a clean, minimal background and accent splashes from the coral and rose gold tones.
